original_title: The Adventures of Timmy the Tooth: Operation Secret Birthday Surprise
overview: Convinced his friends forgot his birthday, Timmy visits Mr. Wisdom and is shown what Flossmore Valley would be like if he wasn't around.

production_companies.name: Universal Studios Home Entertainment Family Productions

tagline: Where Imagination Is Your Passport To Adventure!
title: The Adventures of Timmy the Tooth: Operation Secret Birthday Surprise
